com.vftlite.util

Class Util

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.vftlite.util.Util

  • public class Util
extends java.lang.Object

    Some utility functions.

    Util is a static class that implements some utility methods.

    Author:
    Saverio Meucci

        This method is used to check if a string contains a substring.
        Parameters:
        text - The string to check.
        token - The substring.
        Returns:
        boolean True if text contains token; false otherwise.

      • countOccurrences

        public static int countOccurrences(java.lang.String text,

        This method is used to count the occurrence of a substring into a string.
        Parameters:
        text - The string to check.
        token - The substring to count.
        Returns:
        int It returns the number of occurrence of token in text.
